title: FIX OCE CLIENT
body: Riot!! WHAT IS HAPPENING TO MY GAME!!! AND EVERYBODYS!!! WE CANNOT CONNECT TO CHAT AND CAN'T QUEUE RANKED, PLZ EXPLAIN{{summoner:11}}

replies.body:

Thank you for update!!
You own man! or Girl!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Haha sorry it's just a copy paste, but glad it helped.

Same. 

Onside note, FIX ILLAOI SHE IS USELESS CHAMPION NOW AND YOU CANNOT EVEN 1v1 SOMEONE FFS!!!{{champion:420}}

Shush she was always a useless champion...
Your dont know what your talking about... Her changes made her better lmao. The e change makes it so much easier in teamfights to hit big ults due to the rapid spawn on the e....
Tho your bronze so just play annie and garen and you will climb.

S4.. I am posting on a Bronze account 

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=xXTankerincXx

I dont care about " climbing " going up a rank.. 
But she is useless.. She cannot even solo top lane anymore.

Also if I wanted to climb.. Xin or Brand would be a better way to go instead of annie and Garen

Tell me why she is useless... Coz she isnt compared to before lol.
Also s4 and bronze are the same thing 
Also annie>brand coz you cant fuck up with annie. You can fuck up with brand and when your silver/bronze using a champion to their full use (aka annie coz shes easy) will win you games.
Now stop complaining when you dont even have a reason coz you lost 1 game. She was always shit

> [{quoted}](name=Sxcrage,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ikJN83k7,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T10:41:28.055+0000)
>
> Tell me why she is useless... Coz she isnt compared to before lol.

Okay. Before 6.9.. Just as 6.8 landed..

Quoted from http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Illaoi?cb=6767

FACT: Overlapping tentacles deal 50% reduced damage. Affects active placed tentacles by her passive and Q as well.

For example, a tentacle deals 500 damage to a unit. Two tentacles damaging the same unit would then deal 750 and three tentacles would then deal 875 damage to that same unit. Either this is a bug that Riot has overlooked for some time or a tooltip that needs to be stated somewhere in her kit preferrably in her passive. Hoping that Riot does something about this.

Then you got the " VESSEL DEBUFF DURATION 60 seconds â‡’ 12 seconds " Why couldnt it be 30 seconds....
FINE.. Take your no more FoW vision.. I can deal with that.

But the fact that if my tentacle over lap.. If I cannot get them again in 12 seconds to keep that debuff on them over and over.. COME ON..
Anyone can see she is broken. You say " She isnt broken. " Well if I said to you. Any champion you play. Will do 50% or less on each spell damage you do.
You would be saying that 6.9 BROKE YOUR CHAMPION TO THE POINT IT IS USELESS.

> [{quoted}](name=Sxcrage,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ikJN83k7,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T10:41:28.055+0000)
>
> Now stop complaining when you dont even have a reason coz you lost 1 game. She was always shit

Well you have your proof of 6.9 MAKING HER USELESS!!

Fire and brimstone! this is the end of all things!

so is new brand srsly what is that riot?
